```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)


df<- read.csv("zooAnimal_medianLifeExpectancy_Jul2018 .csv")

```


```{r}
Hmisc::describe(df)

str(df)

df_agg <- df %>% group_by(TaxonClass) %>%
  summarise(Avg_Male_Lif_Exp = mean(Male.MLE,na.rm = T),
            Avg_Female_Lif_Exp = mean(Male.MLE, na.rm = T)
                                          
                                          )

```
